sf177:4: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam abhāvitam amṛdu bhavati akarmaṇyaṁ yathedaṁ cittam | cittaṁ hi bhikṣavaḥ abhāvitam amṛdu bhavati akarmaṇyam |
sf177:5: tasmāt tarhy evaṁ śikṣitavyaṁ yan naś cittam abhāvitam amṛdu bhaviṣyati akarmaṇyam evaṁ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam ||
sf177:6: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evaṁ subhāvitaṁ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṁ yathedaṁ cittaṁ | cittaṁ hi bhikṣavaḥ subhāvitaṁ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyam |
sf177:7: tasmāt tarhy evaṁ śikṣitavyaṁ yac cittaṁ naḥ subhāvitaṁ mṛdu bhaviṣyati karmaṇyam evaṁ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam ||
sf177:8: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam subhāvitaṁ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṁ yathedaṁ cittam | cittaṁ hi bhikṣavaḥ subhāvitaṁ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṁ |
sf177:9: tadyathā yāni kānicid dārujātāni syuḥ candanaṁ teṣām agram ākhyāyate mṛdutāyāṁ karmaṇyatāyāṁ |
sf177:10: evam eva nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam subhāvitaṁ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṁ yathedaṁ cittam | cittaṁ hi bhikṣavaḥ subhāvitaṁ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyam |
sf177:11: tasmāt tarhy evaṁ śikṣitavyaṁ yac cittaṁ naḥ subhāvitaṁ mṛdu bhaviṣyati karmaṇyam evaṁ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam || ||
